verses.roman:
teṣām uddāma-vīryāṇām
aṣṭā-daśa mahā-rathāḥ
āsann udāra-yaśasas
teṣāṁ nāmāni me śṛṇu

synonyms: teṣām—of these (sons); uddāma—unlimited; vīryāṇām—whose prowess; aṣṭā-daśa—eighteen; mahā-rathāḥ—mahā-rathas, the highest class of chariot warriors; āsan—were; udāra—widespread; yaśasaḥ—whose fame; teṣām—their; nāmāni—names; me—from me; śṛṇu—hear.
translation: Among these sons, all possessing unlimited valor, eighteen were mahā-rathas of great renown. Now hear their names from me.
